about_the_game:
This is a world where humans and monsters coexist peacefully, without interfering with each other's living spaces. However, one day, the demon became manic and attacked humans who were active in the wilderness for no reason. As the leader of the Blanoy Defense Team, the player was ordered by the mayor to investigate the cause of this incident. As all members of the Defense Team need to be on guard in the city to prevent the invasion of monsters, the player needs to recruit various warriors to form their own combat team.

  • Challenge the boss and show off your skills

      The core gameplay of the game is to challenge the wilderness boss, and challenging the boss requires players to switch roles and layout positions to reduce the boss's damage to the team. The combination of professions and exquisite operations are the key to successfully killing bosses.

  • Numerous characters, freely matched

      There are a total of 25 characters in the Little Warriors team, divided into 5 professions, each with two skills. Players can form a powerful team to fight according to their preferences and the skills of their characters.

  • Collect materials and synthesize equipment

      Each character in the game can wear up to 6 types of equipment, each with 5 qualities. Kill monsters in the wild to obtain materials, which are used to synthesize equipment.

  • Interesting puzzle solving, full of challenges

       Some puzzle solving gameplay will be added to the plot to add a touch of color to the game and avoid players feeling bored by blindly fighting. There is a certain level of difficulty in solving puzzles. If players cannot ultimately solve them, they can join the communication group or seek help in the comments.

  • Passionate battle, showcasing strategy

      The game also features a challenging training ground where players can compete against another team. The training ground includes four levels of difficulty: simple, normal, difficult, and nightmare. Each challenge will randomly generate different teams, allowing players to fully experience the combat experience of different teams.

     The game is currently released in a single player version, and we will update the networking function in the future. At that time, we will add player battles, world chats, guild and other gameplay. Please stay tuned

Official communication group: Q group number 891821082 (Little Warriors Exchange Meeting)

This is a world where humans and monsters coexist peacefully, without interfering with each other's living spaces. However, one day, the demon became manic and attacked humans who were active in the wilderness for no reason. As the leader of the Blanoy Defense Team, the player was ordered by the mayor to investigate the cause of this incident. As all members of the Defense Team need to be on guard in the city to prevent the invasion of monsters, the player needs to recruit various warriors to form their own combat team.

name: 小小勇士团Little Warriors Team

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

short_description: The Little Warriors team includes gameplay such as character development, material collection, equipment synthesis, and challenging bosses. The game allowing players to form battle teams according to their preferences and freely switch between controlled characters during battles.
